=== Summary ===
We're organizing a small release party (max 30 ppl) in Ghent.

=== When & where ===
* Date: 09/05/2009
* Time: (19 h. ? till ?)
* Where: Curieuze Neuze, Brusselsesteenweg 412, 9000 Ghent. Easy to reach by tram & bus from the train station (line 21).
=== More info ===
* There is a kitchen, if you would like to eat a pasta, steak or stuff like that... (there will be a mailing including the menu & prizes)
* http://www.releaseparty.eu/show.php?release-party=gent-(be)
* http://mimor.be/2009/jaunty-release-party-ghent-0905/
* Optional subscription on: http://mimor.be/releaseparty-inschrijving-2/
